title: Putin Blames U.S. and Europe for Ukraine Tensions
sub_head: The Russian president called for further development of the country’s armed forces
body:
Russian President Vladimir Putin hardened his rhetoric toward the West, blaming the U.S. and Europe for deteriorating relations and vowing to retaliate against their aggression as he ordered the further development of Russia’s armed forces and its weaponry.
“What is happening now, the tension that is developing in Europe, is their fault,” Mr. Putin told a Russian Defense Ministry board meeting on Tuesday. “At every step, Russia was forced to somehow respond, at every step the situation was constantly getting worse, worse, worse. And today we are in a situation where we are forced to decide something.”
